dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item AS DebitItem, SUM(CashAssets.Amount) AS AmountReceipt FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.Amount > 0 AND CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN CashAssets.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END
GROUP BY CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item

dataSet.name: DataSet2
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Period, RegisterRecords, ) AS CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: DataSet3
dataSet.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item AS ExpenseItem, SUM(CashAssets.Amount) AS AmountExpense FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.Amount > 0 AND CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN CashAssets.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END
GROUP BY CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item
